snippet: Jessica Rivera, who has multiple sclerosis, found a new apartment that could accommodate her family and motorized wheelchair.
abstract: Children's Aid Society helps Jessica Rivera of the Bronx, single mother who suffers from multiple sclerosis, pay broker's fee for new apartment that can accommodate her family and motorized wheelchair.
lead_paragraph: Jessica Rivera, who has multiple sclerosis, found a new apartment that could accommodate her family and motorized wheelchair.

headline.print_headline: Focusing on the Children, Not the Illness
headline.seo: Bronx Woman Focuses on Her Children, Not Her Illness
headline.main: Focusing on the Children, Not the Illness
